resources.string: Failed to send. Server returned error
Failed. Server rejected the request or was just pure angry with you.

Colours, although pretty, currently doesn\'t show the time. Due to font restrictions and a few other details, we decided it was best to put it aside and work on other aspects of the collection. If you\'re alright with no time being shown, feel free to install it.\n\nColours does not work on non-Pebble Time devices for obvious reasons.
